data.text: I've just check the log file and the systems are getting a lot of "Thread was being aborted" and "The underlying connection was closed:...". Basically timeouts. I don't see any quick fixes or code change that will drastically improve performance without re-thinking the system architecture. The capturer application pool is currently running at 1.2GB. It baffles me how the  system yesterday at 3pm suddenly drops in speed. @gillianoberholzer @neilbosworth @willemhuman @yasserogier
